chatInterview.title: Interview Invitation from {{companyName}}
chatInterview.notAttend: You did not attend the interview.
chatInterview.confirmText1:
By accepting this interview invite, I agreed that I will show up for the interview at the given time and place. 
If I need to change the time, I will notify the recruiter at least 7 hours in advance.
chatInterview.contirmText2: Job seekers who do not turn up for interview will be marked as “No Show”. Job seekers who accumulate 3 no-show records in 3 months will be banned from using Bossjob for 6 months.
chatInterview.askResultText1: You are unable to request for interview result as you did not attend the interview.
chatInterview.askResultText2: You can only request for result from {{enableDate}} onwards.
chatInterview.retime: I would like to reschedule the interview timing.
chatInterview.cancelReasonLabel: You are about to cancel the interview. Please let recruiter know why you are cancelling this interview:

resumetemplate.title: Free resume template
resumetemplate.subTitle: Create and download resume in a minute.

howToCreate.title: How to create resume template
howToCreate.step1: Fill in your name as well as a valid email (important that you enter a valid email which will be used in your resume template)
howToCreate.step2: Click on “Create Resume” and proceed to fill in more information such as personal summary and career objectives, education, experience, skills, and more.
howToCreate.step3: Download, print and save your new resume
howToCreate.step4: Update your online resume any time and create new resume template whenever you wish to

resumetemplate.freeAnswer: Yes, Bossjob resume generation service is free. You can create as many resume as you want. You can choose from different themes of resume samples and use different resume sample for different job applications
resumetemplate.chooseTemplate: How many templates can I choose from?
resumetemplate.chooseTemplateAnswer: You can choose from 2 templates, professional or creative resume samples. You can immediately use your newly improved resume to apply for job openings on Bossjob.
resumetemplate.editLater: Would I be able to edit the resume template later?
resumetemplate.editLaterAnswer: Absolutely yes. Login to your Bossjob account anytime to update your resume. You can use your Bossjob account as a resume bank. Keep your most updated career details in Bossjob and use them as your professional identity!

accountSetting.title: Account Setting

errorMsg.optIncorrect: OTP is incorrect. Please try again.

accountSetting.emailTip: Receive job applications updates through your email.
accountSetting.editEmailExplanation: Your email has been verified. You will be able to receive job applications update through your email. To change your email address, please verify your new email address.
accountSetting.notVerifyTips: To receive job applications update, please verify your email.
accountSetting.enterCode: Enter the code that we have sent to {{email}}
accountSetting.mobileTip: Help recruiters to better contact you for job opportunities.
accountSetting.mobileNotVerified: To help recruiters to better contact you for job opportunities. please verify your mobile number.
accountSetting.mobileExplanation: Your mobile number has been verified. Recruiters will be able to contact you through your mobile number. To change your mobile number, please verify your new mobile number.
accountSetting.receiveNewMessage: Receive new chat messages or resume request from recruiters:
accountSetting.receiveNewMessageExplanation: This is to notify you of new chat messages or resume request. You will only receive email notification for this when you are offline
accountSetting.receiveFromSystemExplanation: This is to inform you of important notification such as jobs that you might be interested in and your interviews details.
accountSetting.receiveTips: Receive career and hiring tips newsletter:
accountSetting.receiveTipsExplanation: This is to share insights and tips that will help you with your job search.
accountSetting.notJobAlert: You have no job alert yet.
accountSetting.deleteTips: You are about to delete this job alert. This cannot be undone.

landing.title: Download Bossjob hiring APP & talk to 10k+ bosses online. | Bossjob
landing.description: Discover job opportunities in {{country}} on Bossjob! Explore jobs hiring from companies in {{country}} & get hired fast!

landing.section1_message1: Hi Sarah, I'm interested in the position. Could you provide more information about the role?
landing.section1_message2: Hi John, your profile is an excellent match for the role. I'd be happy to provide more details. What specifically would you like to know?
landing.section1_message3: Can you tell me more about the company culture and team I'd be working with?
landing.section1_message4: Sure. Our company culture is collaborative and team-oriented, and we pride ourselves on creating a supportive work environment. You'd be working with a talented and diverse team of professionals who are passionate about what they do.
landing.section1_message5: That sounds great. I'd love to learn more about the next steps in the application process.
landing.section1_message6: Excellent. Our next step would be to schedule a phone interview. How does next Tuesday at 2:00pm work for you?
landing.section1_message7: That works perfectly. Thank you, Sarah.
landing.section1_message8: Thank you, John. I look forward to speaking with you next week.
landing.section1_subtitle: connect you with decision makers in real-time
landing.section3_subtitle: a better & faster way to find jobs
landing.section3_list_des1: Match jobs for you using Big data & AI models!
landing.section3_list_des2: Talk to hiring managers, bosses and decision makers during your job hunt.
landing.section3_list_des3: Bossjob APP provides a seamless job hunting experience on the go.
landing.section3_list_des4: Our built-in chat features enable instant engagement, from job application to interview, all done within minutes.
landing.section4_list_des1: Quickly connect with hiring managers on the go. You can secure interviews and offers at lightning speed, saving time and simplifying your job search!
landing.section4_list_des2: Our next-gen AI delivers personalised job recommendations that continuously learn and evolve over time, ensuring you always have the most relevant job opportunities.
landing.section4_list_title3: Elevate your personal brand with Chat-GPT
landing.section4_list_des3: Leverage the most advanced technology - ChatGPT - to help you build a personalized resume & statement that highlights your unique skills, setting you apart from others!
landing.section4_list_des4: We provide a window into a company's culture and values, so you can determine if they align with your own, empowering you to find an ideal workplace to thrive!
landing.section5_list_des1: Build your resume easily, choose from a variety of templates
landing.section5_list_des2: Protect your privacy and easily block companies
landing.section5_list_des3: Customise your chat messages and make a great impression.
landing.section5_list_des4: Never miss an interview again. Sync your interview schedule directly to your phone
landing.section7_list_des1: Bossjob attracts 2.9 million users in PHL, secures $5m funding to boost globalization efforts
landing.section7_list_des2: Filipino job search platform Bossjob secures US$5M in venture funding
landing.section7_list_des3: Grab Ventures Ignite helps Singaporean startup Bossjob kickstart in Vietnam
landing.section7_list_des4: Bossjob revolutionizes recruitment with AI Technology, expands on product features to win new markets
